summary: THE AIR BAG LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE DASHBOARD, WHICH ALSO CAUSED THE HORN NOT TO WORK. THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED ABOUT A RECALL REGARDING THE ISSUE, HOWEVER THE CONSUMER VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  THE CONSUMER HAD TO PAY TO HAVE THE CLOCK SPRING REPLACED.   *JB      *CB   *NLM
